name: KRAUT CHASER
description:
Kraut Chaser is a short game where you use a Baguette, Ketchup, Mustard, and the titular Sauerkraut to chase a runaway hot dog cart. When your close, be sure to catch it! You wouldn't want to lose your title as the world's best hot dog salesman now would you? 

Made in 1 week for ACM Game Dev's Spring 2023 Game Jam using entirely original assets.
